description: This Kotlin file defines a Fragment named FavoritesFragment for an Android application. It manages a list of favorite items, displaying them via a RecyclerView, and handles user interactions such as opening a favorite item or removing it. The file also includes a nested adapter class and a view holder class for rendering the list items.

classes.name: FavoritesAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView adapter for displaying favorite items with Open and Remove actions.

classes.name: FavoritesViewHolder
classes.description: ViewHolder class for binding favorite item views, including title, subtitle, and action buttons.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes RecyclerView and TextView references after view creation.

methods.name: onResume
methods.description: Triggers the render function to update the favorites list when the fragment resumes.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Fetches favorite items, updates UI visibility, and sets the RecyclerView adapter with interaction handlers.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Factory method to create a new instance of FavoritesFragment.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the layout for a single favorite item and creates a ViewHolder.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data to the ViewHolder for a specific position.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of favorite items.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Binds favorite item data to UI elements and sets click listeners for actions.
